Name: insilicorun
description: increment each time you repeat in silico analysis

Name: root
description: the root to your tools and data

Name: leftinputfile
description: fastq file with left read of sequence

Name: rightinputfile
description: fastq file with right read of sequence

Name: projectdir
description: project folder for this insilico run

Name: projectrawdatadir
description: project specific rawdata directory for (demultiplexed) reads

Name: intermediatedir
description: store intermediate results here; empty at end of project

Name: leftbarcode
description: use these in case of demultiplexed files

Name: outputleftright
description: file locations for both ends where we save demultiplexed reads, given respecive project folder and barcode

Name: demultiplexinfodir
description: directory in which we store logs and discarded reads files

Name: logfile
description: log file with statistics on demultiplexing process

Name: discardleft
description: file that contains 'left ends' of sequences with undected barcodes

Name: discardright
description: file that contains 'right ends' of sequences with undected barcodes

Name: leftfilegz
description: gziped file, in project raw data dir
